UPDATE JNL_CONTACT_LOG
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=varchar},
contact_time = #{contact_time,jdbcType=varchar},
chn_code = #{chn_code,jdbcType=varchar},
teller_no = #{teller_no,jdbcType=varchar},
instno = #{instno,jdbcType=varchar},
contact_mode = #{contact_mode,jdbcType=varchar},
cust_no = #{cust_no,jdbcType=varchar},
cust_name = #{cust_name,jdbcType=varchar},
biz_type = #{biz_type,jdbcType=varchar}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
